DOC.brief_summary: This continuation study provide continue treatment subject complete study HGS1006-C1056 United States , evaluate long-term safety efficacy belimumab ( LymphoStat-B™ ) subject SLE disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Continuation Trial Subjects With Lupus Who Completed Protocol HGS1006-C1056 United States
DOC.detailed_description: This long-term continuation study provide continue treatment subject complete study HGS1006-C1056 United States . This study evaluate long-term safety efficacy belimumab ( LymphoStat-B™ ) subject SLE disease .
DOC.criteria: Have complete HGS1006C1056 protocol United States Week 72 visit . Be able receive 1st dose belimumab HGS 1006c1066 four week last dose HGS1006c1056 . Have develop medical disease condition make subject unsuitable study opinion physician .
